text: Hello, i'm using a CRM card. How to call a HubSpot endpoints from the dataFetchRequest using oauth ? Is there a way to do that ?

Hey all,
How to insert multiple rows in a HubDb table using 'Add a Row' API created by HubSpot

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/hubdb>
I am only able to insert single row at a time
Hi, i need to know if the MULTIPLE LINE TEXT data type recognizes a list to pass information by API
hi! how can we access export_to_template_context items within blog api

Hello Guys,

Does anyone know if it is possible to create “Custom Workflow Actions” for HubSpot’s private apps? I am currently doing a custom integration for my company ran into a road block when trying to use the /automation/v4/actions/{appId} API endpoint. So far, i was able to use the Bearer Token for the private app to create custom objects and access built-in object types.

The error i got was when i tried using the custom action API is: “This API can’t be called using an OAuth access token. A valid developer API key must be provided in the `hapikey` query parameter, and a valid `appId` must be provided in the API request.”

Does this mean I will have to create a public app in order to access it? Further, i tried the main API key on the account and that didn’t work either.

Kind regards,
